ing: 2 avocados from Mexico, peeled, pitted and diced
des: "Creamy avocados, onion and diced tomatoes combine to make the best dip for tortilla chips! This guacamole is also good as a condiment for sandwiches."
ins:
Combine avocados, tomatoes, onion, garlic and lime juice. Stir well, mashing but leaving some chunks of avocado. Season with salt; stir to combine.
Serve immediately or chill for 30 minutes.
